Articles.Content:
Just thought I'd pop in and say a quick hello. Hello!. There we are, that was easy.

Been playing KSP for a little while now, I find anything that has things that go "WOOOOSH, WEEEEEEEE, BANG, SPLAT" very gratifying to play. Also there's a nice science element to it which is also enjoyable. I just think I need to work on less bang and splat, and more safe landings on the Mun.

Hiya Monkster, welcome to the community

Yeah, safe landings would be good for Bob and Bill, Jeb meanwhile, well if you can walk away from it, it's a good landing
